name: Ext_R2_Goal_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Goal.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Goal.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Goal|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: proposed | planned | accepted | rejected | in-progress | achieved | sustaining | on-hold | cancelled
element.definition: Indicates whether the goal has been reached and is still considered relevant.
element.comment: `Goal.status` maps to R4 `Goal.lifecycleStatus`. To multiple elements in Goal: (`Goal.lifecycleStatus`, `Goal.achievementStatus`). The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo. `Goal.status` maps to R4 `Goal.achievementStatus`. To multiple elements in Goal: (`Goal.lifecycleStatus`, `Goal.achievementStatus`). Has no type mapping `achievementStatus` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/goal-status`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element Goal.status is flagged IsModifier

element.short: proposed | planned | accepted | rejected | in-progress | achieved | sustaining | on-hold | cancelled
element.definition: Indicates whether the goal has been reached and is still considered relevant.
element.comment: `Goal.status` maps to R4 `Goal.lifecycleStatus`. To multiple elements in Goal: (`Goal.lifecycleStatus`, `Goal.achievementStatus`). The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo. `Goal.status` maps to R4 `Goal.achievementStatus`. To multiple elements in Goal: (`Goal.lifecycleStatus`, `Goal.achievementStatus`). Has no type mapping `achievementStatus` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/goal-status`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Indicates whether the goal has been met and is still being targeted
